name: InfectiousArthritis
title: Infectious Arthritis
description: Documented diagnosis of Infectious arthritis (Business ID: Entry 1610616)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Infectious Arthritis.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an documented diagnosis of infectious arthritis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Infectious Arthritis.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Infectious Arthritis.)
